exercises.title: Push-up
exercises.description: A basic upper body exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.title: Squat
exercises.description: A fundamental lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.title: Plank
exercises.description: A core exercise that strengthens the abdominal muscles and lower back.

exercises.title: Lunge
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.title: Bicep Curl
exercises.description: An upper body exercise that targets the biceps.
